markdown:
'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [location](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireWorldMap/) in {{poe2}}.

## Background

The local slammer, overseen by Watch Commander [Savia](/savia/).

## Points of interest

* Not much to see here, beyond the watch commander and Riggere in one of the cells.
* During [The Drunk Sailor](/theDrunkSailor/), you can break Riggere out by blowing up the wall adjacent to his cell.

## Characters

* [Savia](/savia/), the watch commander.
* [Rum-Dumb Riggere](/rumDumbRiggere/), a potential crew member.

## Loot

* There is a hidden straw pile underneath the bench in the northern-most cell containing two [lockpicks](/lockpickDeadfire/).

## Gallery

'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
The local slammer, overseen by Watch Commander [[Savia]].

==Points of interest==
* Not much to see here, beyond the watch commander and Riggere in one of the cells.
* During [[The Drunk Sailor]], you can break Riggere out by blowing up the wall adjacent to his cell.

==Characters==
* [[Savia]], the watch commander.
* [[Rum-Dumb Riggere]], a potential crew member.

==Loot==
* There is a hidden straw pile underneath the bench in the northern-most cell containing two [[Lockpick (Deadfire)|lockpicks]].
